definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: The son HAD well profited by the precept and example of the father.
sentences.chinese: 老太爷的言传身教早已使他儿子获益无穷。

definition: (respectful for) one's grandfather/sb's father/older people/the head of the house (used by servants)/a district magistrate
(old) dowager/old lady (title for the mother of a noble or an official)
son-in-law (used by wife's family)/uncle (husband of father's sister)
wife of mother's brother/aunt/maternal uncle's wife
great uncle/grandfather's younger brother/husband's father's younger brother
son of the boss/young master of the house/your son (honorific)
